doctorsList.name: Dr Sreekanth Appasani
doctorsList.designation: Consultant Interventional Gastroenterologist & Hepatologist, Advanced Therapeutic Endoscopist
achievements: Secured 1st rank in schooling from L.K.G. to 10th std
Stood 1st in the college during Intermediate Education
Secured 52nd rank in Medical Entrance in 1st attempt - 1995
Best outgoing student of the 1997 batch – Andhra Medical College
Secured 1st rank in NIMSET (MD Entrance) in 1st attempt - 2003
Secured 1st rank in All India PGI entrance for DM gastroenterology – 2008
'10' Gold Medals during Graduation in Andhra Medical College
Best poster award in small bowel section @ ISGCON 2010
publications: Benign gastric outlet obstruction – spectrum and management. Tropical Gastroenterology 2011;32(4):259–266.
An Uncommon Cause of Dysphagia. Dysphagia. 2012 Mar;27(1):145-7.
Hepatic artery aneurysm: a rare presentation as cholangitis and portal hypertension. Gastrointest Endosc. 2012 Jan;75(1):190.
Lamotrigine Induced Vanishing Bile Duct Syndrome in a Child. J Pediatr Gastroenterol Nutr. 2012 Dec;55(6):e147-8.
Fluid replacement in acute pancreatitis. Nutritional Therapy & Metabolism 2012; 30(2);67-78.
Biliary stent with a tied suture! Gastrointest Endosc. 2012 Sep;76(3):669-71.
Celiac Disease Complicated By Lymphoma: A Case Report. Trop Gastroenterol. 2014 Jan-Mar;35(1):55-6.
Celiac disease presenting as recurrent pancreatitis and pseudocyst. JOP. 2012 Sep 10;13(5):533-5.
Prospective validation of 4-category classification of acute pancreatitis severity. Pancreas. 2013 Apr;42(3):392-6.
Dynamic nature of organ failure in severe acute pancreatitis. HPB (Oxford). 2013 Jul;15(7):523-8.
Biodegradable stents: truly biodegradable with good tissue harmony. Endoscopy. 2013 May;45 Suppl 2:E116-7.
Endoscopic ultrasound assisted etiological localization in acute pancreatitis. Endosc Ultrasound 2013;2:162-4.
Stents for benign and malignant esophageal strictures. Ann N Y Acad Sci. 2013 Oct;1300:119-43.
Implementation of the Asia-Pacific Guidelines of Obesity Classification on the APACHEO Scoring System. Dig Dis Sci. 2014 Jun;59(6):1316-21.
Hypotension in the First Week of Acute Pancreatitis and APACHE II Score Predict Development of Infected Pancreatic Necrosis. Dig Dis Sci. 2015 Feb;60(2):537-42.
Mega stents - New option for management of leaks following laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy. Endoscopy. 2014;46 Suppl 1 UCTN:E49-50.
Role of 13NH3 PET/CT in delineating pancreatic necrosis in acute pancreatitis. Pancreatology. 2014 May-Jun;14(3):154-8.
Utility of narrow band imaging in predicting histology in celiac disease. Indian J Gastroenterol. 2020 Aug;39(4):370-376.
Pancreatic fluid collections: What is the ideal imaging technique? World J Gastroenterol. 2015 Dec 28;21(48):13403-10.
awards: VAIDYA RATNA AWARD in Sankranti Puraskar 2015 by Suman Art Theaters for services rendered in the field of gastroenterology
NATIONAL ITEGRATION AWARD on the eve of republic day 2015 for services rendered in the field of gastroenterology

doctorsList.name: Dr. Bhaskar Kante
doctorsList.qualifications: MD (Int. Med), DM (Med. Gastro), Fellowship (IBD AIIMS)

items.title: POEM (Peroral Endoscopic Myotomy)
items.description: Our product effortlessly adjusts to your needs, boosting efficiency and simplifying your tasks.

items.title: EMR (Endoscopic Mucosal Resection)
items.description: Experience unmatched durability that goes above and beyond with lasting investment.

items.title: ESD (Endoscopic Submucosal Dissection)
items.description: Integrate our product into your routine with an intuitive and easy-to-use interface.

items.title: STER (Submucosal Tunneling Endoscopic Resection)
items.description: Stay ahead with features that set new standards, addressing your evolving needs better than the rest.

items.title: ARMA (Anti-reflux Mucosal Ablation)
items.description: A cutting-edge solution for reflux management with long-term relief.

items.title: GERDx (Anti-Reflux Mucosal Ablation Therapy)
items.description: Effective anti-reflux therapy designed to provide relief and improve patient outcomes.

items.title: FTRD (Full-Thickness Resection Device)
items.description: Innovative technology for precise tissue resection and minimal complications.

items.title: EUS- Biliary Drainage
items.description: Advanced procedure for biliary drainage using Endoscopic Ultrasound.

items.title: EUS- GJ (Gastrojejunostomy)
items.description: A minimally invasive approach to treating obstructed gastric bypasses.

items.title: EUS- RF Ablation
items.description: Revolutionary treatment option using radiofrequency for enhanced therapeutic results.

items.title: EUS Cystogastrostomy
items.description: Endoscopic ultrasound-assisted technique for drainage of pancreatic cysts.

items.title: Endoscopic Necrosectomy
items.description: Minimally invasive procedure for managing pancreatic necrosis.

items.title: ERCP- Endoscopic Retrograde Cholangiopancreatography
items.description: A diagnostic and therapeutic procedure to treat biliary and pancreatic disorders.

items.title: Bariatric Endoscopy- ESG (Endoscopic Sleeve Gastrectomy)
items.description: A minimally invasive bariatric procedure for weight loss.

items.title: Biofeedback
items.description: A non-invasive approach to managing stress and improving overall health.
